trans-unit.source: Installing Windows PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Instalar o Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: Installing Windows PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Instalar o Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: Windows® 8 and Windows Server® 2012 include Windows PowerShell 3.0 and all of its prerequisites.
trans-unit.target: O Windows® 8 e o Windows Server® 2012 incluem o Windows PowerShell 3.0 e todos os seus pré-requisitos.

trans-unit.source: The system also includes the Windows PowerShell 2.0 engine for backward compatibility with host programs that cannot use Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: O sistema também inclui o Mecanismo Windows PowerShell 2.0 para compatibilidade com programas host que não podem usar o Windows PowerShell 3.0.

trans-unit.source: This topic explains how to install Windows PowerShell 3.0 on earlier systems and install and enable the required features.
trans-unit.target: Este tópico explica como instalar o Windows PowerShell 3.0 em sistemas anteriores e instalar e habilitar os recursos necessários.

trans-unit.source: This topic includes the following sections:
trans-unit.target: Este tópico inclui as seções a seguir:

trans-unit.source: Installing Windows PowerShell on Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012
trans-unit.target: Instalar o Windows PowerShell no Windows 8 e no Windows Server 2012

trans-unit.source: Installing Windows PowerShell on Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2
trans-unit.target: Instalar o Windows PowerShell no Windows 7 e no Windows Server 2008 R2

trans-unit.source: Installing Windows PowerShell on Windows Server 2008
trans-unit.target: Instalar o Windows PowerShell no Windows Server 2008

trans-unit.source: Installing Windows PowerShell on Server Core
trans-unit.target: Instalar o Windows PowerShell no Server Core

trans-unit.source: Deploying Windows PowerShell Web Access
trans-unit.target: Implantar o Windows PowerShell Web Access

trans-unit.source: Installing the Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine
trans-unit.target: Instalar o Mecanismo do Windows PowerShell 2.0

trans-unit.source: Installing Windows PowerShell on Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012
trans-unit.target: Instalar o Windows PowerShell no Windows 8 e no Windows Server 2012

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 3.0 arrives installed, configured, and ready to use.
trans-unit.target: O Windows PowerShell 3.0 chega instalado, configurado e pronto para uso.

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell Integrated Scripting Environment (ISE) is installed and enabled.
trans-unit.target: O ISE (Ambiente de Script Integrado) do Windows PowerShell está instalado e habilitado.

trans-unit.source: For information about starting Windows PowerShell, see [Starting Windows PowerShell on Windows 8](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/d7be1668-8617-4890-ad90-dd9765fbd2c3) and [Starting Windows PowerShell on Windows Server 2012](https://technet.microsoft.com/library/hh831491.aspx#BKMK_powershell).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como iniciar o Windows PowerShell, consulte [Starting Windows PowerShell on Windows 8](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/d7be1668-8617-4890-ad90-dd9765fbd2c3) (Iniciando o Windows PowerShell no Windows 8) e [Starting Windows PowerShell on Windows Server 2012](https://technet.microsoft.com/library/hh831491.aspx#BKMK_powershell) (Iniciando o Windows PowerShell no Windows Server 2012).

trans-unit.source: Installing Windows PowerShell on Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2
trans-unit.target: Instalar o Windows PowerShell no Windows 7 e no Windows Server 2008 R2

trans-unit.source: These instructions explain how to install Windows PowerShell 3.0 on computers running Windows 7 with Service Pack 1 and Windows Server 2008 R2 with Service Pack 1.
trans-unit.target: Estas instruções explicam como instalar o Windows PowerShell 3.0 em computadores com o Windows 7 com Service Pack 1 e Windows Server 2008 R2 com Service Pack 1.

trans-unit.source: There are separate installation instructions below for computers running with the Server Core installation option of Windows Server 2008 R2.
trans-unit.target: Há instruções de instalação separadas abaixo para computadores que executam com a opção de instalação Server Core do Windows Server 2008 R2.

trans-unit.source: Getting ready to install
trans-unit.target: Preparando para instalar

trans-unit.source: Before installing Windows Management Framework 3.0, uninstall any previous versions of Windows Management Framework 3.0.
trans-unit.target: Antes de instalar o Windows Management Framework 3.0, desinstale todas as versões anteriores do Windows Management Framework 3.0.

trans-unit.source: To install Windows PowerShell 3.0
trans-unit.target: Para instalar o Windows PowerShell 3.0

trans-unit.source: Install the full installation of Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (dotNetFx40\_Full\_setup.exe) from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212547](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212547).
trans-unit.target: Instale a instalação completa do Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (dotNetFx40\_Full\_setup.exe) do Centro de Download da Microsoft em [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212547](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212547).

trans-unit.source: Or, install Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 (dotNetFx45\_Full\_setup.exe) from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919).
trans-unit.target: Ou, instale o Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 (dotNetFx45\_Full\_setup.exe) do Centro de Download da Microsoft em [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919).

trans-unit.source: Install Windows Management Framework 3.0 from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290).
trans-unit.target: Instale o Windows Management Framework 3.0 do Centro de Download da Microsoft em [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290).

trans-unit.source: For information about starting Windows PowerShell 3.0, see [Starting Windows PowerShell on Earlier Versions of Windows](Starting-Windows-PowerShell-on-Earlier-Versions-of-Windows.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como iniciar o Windows PowerShell 3.0, consulte [Starting Windows PowerShell on Earlier Versions of Windows](Starting-Windows-PowerShell-on-Earlier-Versions-of-Windows.md) (Iniciando o Windows PowerShell em versões anteriores do Windows).

trans-unit.source: Installing Windows PowerShell on Server Core
trans-unit.target: Instalar o Windows PowerShell no Server Core

trans-unit.source: These instructions explain how to install Windows PowerShell 3.0 on computers running the Server Core installation option of Windows Server 2008 R2 with Service Pack 1.
trans-unit.target: Essas instruções explicam como instalar o Windows PowerShell 3.0 em computadores que executam a opção de instalação Server Core do Windows Server 2008 R2 com Service Pack 1.

trans-unit.source: The first steps in the procedure use Deployment Image Servicing and Management (DISM) commands to install Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0 for Server Core and Windows PowerShell 2.0.
trans-unit.target: Os primeiros passos do procedimento usam os comandos DISM (Gerenciamento e Manutenção de Imagens de Implantação) para instalar o Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0 para Server Core e Windows PowerShell 2.0.

trans-unit.source: These programs are prerequisites for Windows Management Framework 3.0, which is installed in a subsequent step.
trans-unit.target: Esses programas são pré-requisitos para o Windows Management Framework 3.0, que é instalado em uma etapa posterior.

trans-unit.source: Getting ready to install
trans-unit.target: Preparando para instalar

trans-unit.source: Before installing Windows Management Framework 3.0, uninstall any previous versions of Windows Management Framework 3.0.
trans-unit.target: Antes de instalar o Windows Management Framework 3.0, desinstale todas as versões anteriores do Windows Management Framework 3.0.

trans-unit.source: To install Windows PowerShell 3.0
trans-unit.target: Para instalar o Windows PowerShell 3.0

trans-unit.source: Start Cmd.exe
trans-unit.target: Iniciar Cmd.exe

trans-unit.source: Run the following DISM commands.
trans-unit.target: Execute um dos seguintes comandos DISM.

trans-unit.source: These commands install .NET Framework 2.0 and Windows PowerShell 2.0.
trans-unit.target: Esses comandos instalam o .NET Framework 2.0 e Windows PowerShell 2.0.

trans-unit.source: Install Microsoft .NET Framework 4.0 full installation for Server Core from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=248450](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=248450).
trans-unit.target: Instale a instalação completa do Microsoft .NET Framework 4.0 para Server Core do Centro de Download da Microsoft em [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=248450](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=248450).

trans-unit.source: Install Windows Management Framework 3.0 from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290).
trans-unit.target: Instale o Windows Management Framework 3.0 do Centro de Download da Microsoft em [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290).

trans-unit.source: Installing Windows PowerShell on Windows Server 2008
trans-unit.target: Instalar o Windows PowerShell no Windows Server 2008

trans-unit.source: These instructions explain how to install Windows PowerShell 3.0 on computers running Windows Server 2008 with Service Pack 2.
trans-unit.target: Essas instruções explicam como instalar o Windows PowerShell 3.0 em computadores com o Windows Server 2008 com o Service Pack 2.

trans-unit.source: On Windows Server 2008 systems, Windows Management Framework (Windows PowerShell 2.0, KB 968930) is a prerequisite for Windows Management Framework 3.0.
trans-unit.target: Em sistemas Windows Server 2008, o Windows Management Framework (Windows PowerShell 2.0, KB 968930) é um pré-requisito para Windows Management Framework 3.0.

trans-unit.source: The "Extended Protection for Authentication" feature protects the computer from authentication forwarding attacks and allows you to use the **UseSSL** parameter when creating remote sessions.
trans-unit.target: O recurso de "Proteção Estendida para Autenticação" protege o computador contra ataques de encaminhamento de autenticação e permite que você use parâmetro **UseSSL** ao criar sessões remotas.

trans-unit.source: To install Windows PowerShell 3.0 and the Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine, use the following procedure.
trans-unit.target: Para instalar o Windows PowerShell 3.0 e o Mecanismo Windows PowerShell 2.0, utilize o seguinte procedimento.

trans-unit.source: Getting ready to install
trans-unit.target: Preparando para instalar

trans-unit.source: Before installing Windows Management Framework 3.0, uninstall any previous versions of Windows Management Framework 3.0.
trans-unit.target: Antes de instalar o Windows Management Framework 3.0, desinstale todas as versões anteriores do Windows Management Framework 3.0.

trans-unit.source: To install Windows PowerShell 3.0
trans-unit.target: Para instalar o Windows PowerShell 3.0

trans-unit.source: Install Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 with Service Pack 1 from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242910](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242910).
trans-unit.target: Instale o Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 com Service Pack 1 no Centro de Download da Microsoft em [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242910](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242910).

trans-unit.source: Install Windows Management Framework (Windows PowerShell 2.0, KB 968930) from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=243035](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=243035).
trans-unit.target: Instale o Windows Management Framework (Windows PowerShell 2.0, KB 968930) do Centro de Download da Microsoft em [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=243035](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=243035).

trans-unit.source: Install the full installation of Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (dotNetFx40\_Full\_setup.exe) from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212547](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212547).
trans-unit.target: Instale a instalação completa do Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (dotNetFx40\_Full\_setup.exe) do Centro de Download da Microsoft em [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212547](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212547).

trans-unit.source: Or, install Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 (dotNetFx45\_Full\_setup.exe) from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919).
trans-unit.target: Ou, instale o Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 (dotNetFx45\_Full\_setup.exe) do Centro de Download da Microsoft em [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919).

trans-unit.source: Install "Extended Protection for Authentication" (KB 968389) from [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=186398](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=186398).
trans-unit.target: Instale a "Proteção Estendida para Autenticação" (KB 968389) de [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=186398](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=186398).

trans-unit.source: Install Windows Management Framework 3.0 from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290).
trans-unit.target: Instale o Windows Management Framework 3.0 do Centro de Download da Microsoft em [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290).

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: Consulte Também

trans-unit.source: [Windows PowerShell System Requirements](Windows-PowerShell-System-Requirements.md) [Starting Windows PowerShell [ps]](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/8ec8c2d7-8e7c-4722-a3d2-498fe5739a8e)
trans-unit.target: [Requisitos do Sistema do Windows PowerShell](Windows-PowerShell-System-Requirements.md) [Iniciando o Windows PowerShell [ps]](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/8ec8c2d7-8e7c-4722-a3d2-498fe5739a8e)
